project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters, with a user-configurable length.

task.name: Ensure inclusion of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
Allow user to configure the length of the password
Write tests to verify password generation under various conditions (length, character types)
Execute tests to ensure password generation works as intended
